Title: Cats
Writer: Lee Hall (screenplay by), Tom Hooper (screenplay by), Andrew Lloyd Webber (based on the stage musical "Cats"), T.S. Eliot (based on the poems poetry collection "Old Possum's Books of Practical Cats" by)
Actors: Robbie Fairchild, Mette Towley, Daniela Norman, Jaih Betote
Plot: A tribe of cats called the Jellicles must decide yearly which one will ascend to the Heaviside Layer and come back to a new Jellicle life.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 11 wins & 6 nominations.
